TopPagesByVisits.SettingsIntroduction: Here you can specify the settings for this plugin.
TopPagesByVisits.SettingsRefreshIntervalDescription: Defines how often the widget should be updated.
TopPagesByVisits.SettingsNumberDescription: Defines how many entries to show in the widget.
TopPagesByVisits.SettingsNumberHelp: Enter a number which is >= 10 and <= 30
